Willow.line: I... don't really talk to my family anymore. I 'left the coop', as Bax would put it. But I'm trying to get back in touch!

Elliot.line: Was it you who invited Liz to this voyage?

Willow.line: Yes, it was. She resents me for leaving, but deep down, I know we can still make amends.
It's... complicated. I wouldn't be comfortable sharing her reasons to others, as it's something very personal to her. It wouldn't be right.

Elliot.line: I understand. Thank you, Ms. Blakewell.
